description:
Provides a MNS topic resource.

-> **NOTE:** Terraform will auto build a mns topic  while it uses `alicloud_mns_topic` to build a mns topic resource.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

LoggingEnabled.description: Is logging enabled? true or false. Default value to false.

MaximumMessageSize.description: This indicates the maximum length, in bytes, of any message body sent to the topic. Valid value range: 1024-65536, i.e., 1K to 64K. Default value to 65536.

Name.description: Two topics on a single account in the same region cannot have the same name. A topic name must start with an English letter or a digit, and can contain English letters, digits, and hyphens, with the length not exceeding 256 characters.
